snippet: Van Cougar, a troupe that bases its shows on found texts, re-enacts viral videos in “Tube,” at St. Mark’s Church.
abstract: Jason Zinoman reviews Van Cougar production Tube, conceived and directed by Mark Sitko, at St Mark's Church.
lead_paragraph: Van Cougar, a troupe that bases its shows on found texts, re-enacts viral videos in “Tube,” at St. Mark’s Church.

headline.seo: Van Cougar Re-enacts Videos at St. Mark’s Church
headline.main: Art Imitates YouTube’s Imitations of Art
headline.print_headline: Art Imitates YouTube’s Imitations of Art
